context.p: Within the Server Nodes area of the Couchbase Administration Web Console, a cluster pending a rebalance operation enables the Rebalance button.

step.cmd: Click Rebalance to initiate a rebalance operation.
step.info: You can monitor the progress of the rebalance operation through the web console.

step.cmd: To stop the rebalance operation (this can be done at any time during the process), click the Stop Rebalance button. This only stops the rebalance operation, it does not cancel the operation. You should complete the rebalance operation.
